title: Verbosity switch is broken

nodes.body:
While I'm at it, I also noticed (on the mac) that the -fileloggerparameters can only take one parameter at a time, not multiple parameters like windows msbuild.

For instance if I specify: 
```
-fileloggerparameters:LogFile=skt/SketchDebug.log;Verbosity=Normal;
```
Then the verbosity parameter is ignored. 
The workaround is to specify the `-fileloggerparameters` keyword twice:
```
-fileloggerparameters:LogFile=skt/SketchDebug.log -fileloggerparameters:Verbosity=Normal;
```

Could you confirm again? If you still get the full command line, then please share a test project that I can test with.

re:fileloggerparameters, quote the argument like: `/flp:"LogFile=a.log;v=diag"` .
radical couldn't reproduce this, and we never heard back from the original author.
